db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to add a C++ backend to a 3D project from Qt Design Studio.

db:article.db:programlisting:
### This file is automatically generated by Qt Design Studio. ### Do not change
qt_add_library(RobotArm STATIC) set_source_files_properties(Constants.qml PROPERTIES QT_QML_SINGLETON_TYPE true )
qt6_add_qml_module(RobotArm URI "RobotArm" VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES Constants.qml )
